title: Multiply by 1
text: The first step is to multiply the measurement to be converted by 1; write 1 as a fraction relating the units given and the units needed.

title: Relating Feet to Inches
text: The conversion from feet to inches is 1 $$foot=12$$ inches.

title: Writing 1 as a Fraction
text: Using the relation between feet and inches, we can rewrite the 1 we multiply in the first step as (12 inches)/(1 feet), so we get the expression 6 feet*(12 inches)/(1 feet).

title: Simplifying
text: Feet divides out, so we get the expression 6*(12 inches)/1.

title: Multiplying
text: Multiply the expression, we get the final answer 72 inches
